Name: Left on Read
About the game: Left on Read is an choice-driven narrative platformer about the harsh realities of modern age communication. You play as a college freshman, texting your crush over the long period of quarantine. You must carefully choose dialogue choices to keep the conversation interesting and the relationship alive as you do your best to not get left on read . Good luck. Credits Weston Bell-Geddes | Director, Designer, Writer, Developer Sheehan Ahmed | Engineer Natalia Godoy | Artist
